function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of employment suspension and unemployment due to COVID-19 on construction projects.","Impact":"Unemployment affecting workers and causing delays in construction projects.","Mitigation":"Implementing safety protocols and guidelines to reduce the risk of COVID-19 transmission in construction sites.","Technologies":"Use of contact tracing apps and wearable technology for monitoring social distancing and contact tracing.","People":"Construction workers, contractors, and project managers.","Owner":"Construction companies, government authorities, and project management teams."}]}
